headline: SPECTRUM TV SELECT CUSTOMERS NOW RECEIVE PEACOCK PREMIUM AT NO EXTRA COST
summary: Spectrum and NBCUniversal today announced that Peacock, NBCUniversal's streaming service, is now available to all Spectrum TV Select video customers at no extra cost, as part of the two companies' new multi-year distribution agreement. Spectrum TV Select customers will receive ad-supported Peacock Premium, which retails for $7.99 per month, included with their video package and featuring live sports, news and entertainment programming from brands such as NBC, Bravo, Universal Pictures and DreamW

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock on Our Buy List and 2 to Brush Off
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.
